snippet: The Vérité Party announced Tuesday that it was pulling out of next month’s legislative elections, saying it was the primary victim of violence during the first round of voting.
abstract: Haiti’s Verite party, leading contender against Pres Michel Martelly’s Tet Kale Party, announces that it will boycott country's October legislative elections.
lead_paragraph: The Vérité Party announced Tuesday that it was pulling out of next month’s legislative elections, saying it was the primary victim of violence during the first round of voting.

headline.main: Haitian Party to Withdraw From Election
headline.print_headline: Haitian Party to Withdraw From Election
